Issue.creator: esplinr
Issue.summary: libvcx error when writing a duplicate schema is unhelpful
Issue.description: (/vagrant/node_modules/node-vcx-wrapper/dist/api/schema.js:64:23) at Generator.throw () at rejected (/vagrant/node_modules/node-vcx-wrapper/dist/api/schema.js:5:65) at inheritedStackTraces: , vcxCode: 8888 } {code} This error doesn't give me any hints about the cause of the problem. Compare with the error returned by a duplicate credential definition: "Error: Can't create, Credential Def already on ledger" >
